name: A theme by MARCU5theBAW5
description:
It took me long enough to do one. Here it is.
Credit to the original artists of any backgrounds that appear on this theme.
additional_info:
Update History:
13 October 2015 - First Release
17 October 2015 - Update: Added Courier typeface
17 October 2015 - Update: Went back to Arial typeface
21 October 2015 - Update: New Backgrounds
6 December 2015 - Update: New Backgrounds after a long time
28 June 2016 - After 6 Months, we updatin' again. All it is is a different battle background.
3 September 2016 - After another long-ass break, changed font to Default PS Font.
